name: auth
title: Authentication Service
description: Interfaces with core systems to provide authentication functionality

authorize.description: Oauth2 authorize route to redirect client to authorize itself.

token.description: Oauth2 token route to generate token using various supported grant types.

userinfo.description: Oauth2 route to retrieve user info associated with a token.

discoveryAuth.description: Oauth2 route to retrieve discovery info for the user name.

keys.description: Oauth2 route to retrieve public key(s) used for signing id_token.

key.description: Oauth2 route to retrieve a specific public key used for signing id_token.
